title: Aleksandr Krendelev
text:
Aleksandr Romanovich Krendelev (; born 29 January 1986) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Russian%20Second%20Division">Russian Second Division</a> in 2004 for <a href="FC%20Severstal%20Cherepovets">FC Severstal Cherepovets</a>. He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20KAMAZ%20Naberezhnye%20Chelny">FC KAMAZ Naberezhnye Chelny</a> on 28 March 2009 in a game against <a href="FC%20Metallurg%20Lipetsk">FC Metallurg Lipetsk</a>.
